title: Strengthening App Development Competencies: Design Project Learning Integrating AI and Environmental Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Design Software Proficiency and General Understanding of Environmental Issues
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Produce at least three environmental problem-solving design prototypes using AI generation tools.
Measuring improvement of environmental awareness level by at least two stages through project reflection reports
Presenting five or more evaluation criteria for assessing the social impact of AI-integrated design in peer feedback sessions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
